definition: to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: Drinking water throughout the day is an important habit to pick up.
sentences.chinese: 全天候饮水补水是个必须养成的重要习惯。

sentences.english: Zardari said the two countries are all-weather close friends.
sentences.chinese: 扎尔达里表示，巴中是全天候的亲密朋友。

sentences.english: The synthetic-rubber track can be used in all weathers on condition that the drainage facilities are good.
sentences.chinese: 塑胶跑道在排水设施完善的条件下，可供全天候使用。

sentences.english: Both countries have become all-weather friends that rely on each other.
sentences.chinese: 中也两国已成为相互信赖的全天候朋友。

sentences.english: Pakistan and China are all-weather and time-tested friends.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦与中国是久经考验的全天候的伙伴。

sentences.english: My wife and I were together 24-7 and parenting knocked us on our asses.
sentences.chinese: 而我与妻全天候守护着，育儿使我们倦极厌尽。

sentences.english: Facts prove that China and Namibia are reliable all-weather friends.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，中纳是可以相互信赖的全天候朋友。

sentences.english: All-weather, corrosion-resistant housings protect the imager for long product life.
sentences.chinese: 全天候防腐支架保护热像仪，使它延长了使用期。

sentences.english: It can be best to run some level of monitoring throughout the environment 24X7.
sentences.chinese: 最好可以全天候地在整个环境中运行某种级别的监控。

sentences.english: All-weather close air support doesn't work in bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 全天候近距空中支援在坏天气里不管用。

sentences.english: Jackson had insisted on retaining a full-time private physician, Dr.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊曾坚持要留下他的全天候私人医生康奈德莫里。

sentences.english: These schools usually offer full-time vocation-specific programs.
sentences.chinese: 这些学校通常开设全天候的各类职业课程。

sentences.english: Upgrading of Mi-35 helicopter has been carried out to provide round-the-clock combat missions.
sentences.chinese: 直升机已经开展升级，目标是提供全天候的作战能力。

sentences.english: Taxis are available at Taoyuan Airport 24 hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 机场计程車提供全天候二十四小时交通服务。

sentences.english: It is another way of saying -- all day and all night, every day of the week.
sentences.chinese: 这是全天候，整晚，整周的另外一种说法。

sentences.english: I think the shop is open 24-7.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这店是全天候营业的。

definition: on call/always available/ready at all times
normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
